message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product and I think it would be a great fit for you. I'm asking for $10,000 for it.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product and think it could be useful, but I am only willing to pay up to $8,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still aiming for a bit more than $8,000.  Considering the value of this product for you, how about we split the difference? I'm willing to sell it to you for $9,000.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I understand your position and respect the value you place on the product. However, I am still unable to go above $8,000 for this item. I hope we can find common ground.
